snippet.title: Where Cards Fall – Release & Platforms Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Where Cards Fall is a coming of age story where you build houses of cards to move through imaginative puzzles and bring vivid memories of adolescence to life. Coming to iPhone, iPad, Apple TV, Mac, and PC in Fall 2017.

Sign up to be notified at launch at http://www.wherecardsfall.com

________________________________________________________________

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wherecardsfall
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wherecardsfall
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wherecardsfall
